actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to encourage students in both vocational and technical skills and liberal arts and humanities to participate in both types of education.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that postsecondary education programs should encourage students to participate in both vocational- technical and liberal arts-humanities education.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to encourage students in both vocational and technical skills and liberal arts and humanities to participate in both types of education.
